docs.lead_paragraph: The Rev. Reinhold C. Tappert, accompanied by his family, last night reached the home of his brother, the Rev. G.H. Tappert, at 796 East 156th Street, where he told of the attacks made upon himself and his parsonage at Berlin, Ontario, by forty members of the 118th Battalion of Canadian Volunteers.

headline.main: TAPPERT TELLS OF ASSAULT; Saved from Canadian Soldiers' Attack by Our Consul, He Says.

docs.abstract: Rev. R. C. Tappert interviewed on details of assault
